usage: A chest for players to store and take treasures
interactivity: its hinged lid could be opened
interactionDeduction: Users will approach the treasure chest and use their hands to make contact with the lid. The interaction will likely involve a pressing motion to push down on the lid, followed by a pulling motion to lift it open. The chest's wooden texture will provide a tactile feedback, and users may feel a slight resistance when lifting the lid due to its weight. The interaction is expected to be momentary as users quickly open the chest to access its contents.

usage: players will use it to open a tresure chest
interactionDeduction: Users will grasp the key using a precision grip, holding it between their thumb and index finger. The interaction will involve a twisting motion as they insert the key into the lock of the treasure chest. The smooth texture of the key will provide a pleasant tactile sensation, and users will likely feel a slight click or resistance when the key engages with the lock mechanism. This interaction will be brief as users will quickly turn the key to unlock the chest.

usage: players will use it to smash things
inertia: relatively heavy with the center of mass concentrated at one end
interactionDeduction: Users will grasp the hammer using a power grip, wrapping their hand around the round handle. The interaction will involve lifting the hammer and swinging it downwards to smash objects. Users will feel the weight of the hammer, with its center of mass concentrated at one end, providing a sense of inertia as they swing. The expected haptic feedback will include a solid impact sensation when the hammer strikes an object, simulating the experience of using a real hammer.

usage: players will punch it for blowing off steam
outline: the punching bag is positioned on the ground. make sure a proxy's volume covers this punching bag
hardness: feeling a little bit soft while punching
interactionDeduction: Users will approach the scarecrow punching bag and use their fists to make contact with it. The interaction will involve a punching motion, where users will strike the bag with their fists, feeling a slight softness upon impact. The punching bag is positioned on the ground, encouraging users to stand and deliver punches. The interaction will be sustained as users may repeatedly punch the bag to blow off steam, experiencing a satisfying feedback from the soft surface.
